messages.subject: Re: need your sage advice
messages.msgSnippet: **I want to thank you very much for your sane answer.  It was very helpful to Liam to hear about Kirby.  Liam really needs to know that he is not the only
messages.messageBody:
**I want to thank you very much for your sane answer. It was very
helpful to
Liam to hear about Kirby. Liam really needs to know that he is not the
only one.**

Hi, Marji --

You are really not alone on this. I'm walking in at least one of your
shoes. My 8yob James has never been to school. He reads, but feels
really unable to write yet. (And I mean single words or very short
sentences that he wishes to write.) I've heard him say things that
indicate that he really believes that he can't do this. And it IS
heartbreaking.

Betsy
